N = int(input())
B = list(map(int, input().split()))

A = [0 for i in range(N)]
A[0] = B[0]
A[-1] = B[-1]

for i in range(1, N-1):
    A[i] = B[i] - A[i-1]

print(sum(A))

N = int(input())
B = list(map(int, input().split()))

A = []
for i in range(N):
    if i == 0:
        A.append(B[i])
    elif i == N-1:
        A.append(B[i-1])
    else:
        A.append(max(B[i-1], B[i]))

print(sum(A))
